title: Long-term benzodiazepine use causes synapse loss and cognitive deficits in mice
description: Long-Term Benzodiazepine Use Attacks Synapses Long-term use of benzodiazepines has been linked to cognitive deficits according to Ludwig Maximilian University Of Munich (LMU) researchers.
